dict.acceptation: 记着；纪念；回想起；送钱[礼物]给…；

sent.orig: Remember that you are mortal. Remember that you are but a man!
sent.trans: 这两句都差不多意思。就是说“记得你只是一个人。记得你也会死”

sent.orig: When we grow old, will you still remember my name and remember my words?
sent.trans: 到我们老去，你还会记得我的名字，想我的话语？

sent.orig: Remember what should be remember,and forget what should be forgetten.alterwhat is changeable,and accept what is mutable.
sent.trans: 记住应该记住的，忘记应该忘记的。改变能够改变的，接受不能改变的。

sent.orig: He can remember a lot of matters, can do my memorandum, helps me to remember matter.
sent.trans: 他能记住许多事，能做我的备忘录，帮我记事。

sent.orig: After the shelling, many people lost the ability to remember; some remember better than others.
sent.trans: 炮击后，很多人都失去了记忆力；有的人记忆力比别人好。
